children.name: Fence
children:
schemaVersion: 2.1.0
metadata:
  name: mydevfile
components:
  - name: mydevfile
    container:
      image: golang
      memoryLimit: 512Mi
      mountSources: true
      command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
      volumeMounts:
        - name: cache
          path: /.cache
  - name: cache
    volume:
      size: 2Gi
